channel.title: Moparisthebest Poker tournaments
channel.description:
I am thinking of hosting some poker tournaments online at one of the following websites: [url=http://www.partypoker.com]www.partypoker.com[/url] [url=http://www.ladbrokes.com]www.ladbrokes.com[/url] [b]<----Confirmed site of hosting[/b] [url=http://www.pokerroom.com]www.pokerroom.com[/url]
Private games specifically for the mopar community of No Limit Texas Hold'em.
We will play with pay money but entry will also cost 100k (RS2)
All entry fees will be submitted to a forum mod (any mods fancy geting involved?)
It will be a 10 person tournament $500 dollar [u]PLAY MONEY[/u] (you are given $1000 play money per day)
Prize Structure will be: 1st 50% - 500k 2nd 30% - 300K 3rd 20% - 200k
Americans are able to play becasue no actual cash is involved. If you are interested please post here and i will add you to the list.
The poker software from the websites is free, you will not be asked for any card details.
Thanks for Reading!
[b][u]Interest Members[/u][/b] 1) Hex Key 2) Miss Silabsoft 3) bobbymoore64 4) Cheesehunk 5) error.login
[size=32pt]Ok i have had confirmation from ladbrokes, The tournaments will be held at [url=http://poker.ladbrokes.com/?DCMP=ILC-en_SBPOK]www.ladbrokes.com[/url]. I suggest downloading their poker client and familiarising your self with it. Have fun![/size]
